content: it s summertime and it s time to crochet a bucket hat here is a cute pattern for you the hat comes in only one size adult size fits most the yarn we use is peaches & creme yarn 100% cotton medium 4 worsted i find that this cotton yarn is stiffer and not too soft so when you finish crocheting the hat it s not too floppy around the brim to complete this project we use two different color yarns the color yarns we use are ecru and spring blue stripes we only need one skein/ball of each color yarn to complete making the hat give it a try and see how yours comes out if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/wgq87mt6yno si=cc2uygw3kuthtnp1
